page.title: 01Perranporth - General
page.content: Perranporth is a Cornish town and a seaside resort.It is quiet in the winter and busy and crowded in the summer.Falmouth is within easy reach. Perranporth has got shops that sell Cornish cream teas and cafes that sell real Cornish cream topped with clotted cream.You can play tennis and go on a boating lake.There are two miles of golden sands.There is a coastal footpath.You can go surfing,pony riding,gliding,hang gliding,play golf or visit the bowling green.There are many hotels,guest houses and B&B places as well as camp sites.There are three main hills,Liskey Hill,St.Georges Hill and Reen Hill.The school at Perranporth is for children under twelve.Really it is a town with {two different faces.
